name: Firebase
description: Google Firebase MCP integration. Manage Firestore databases, authentication, cloud functions, hosting, and storage. Build and manage your Firebase backend directly from your development workflow.
longDescription: Official Google MCP server (runs via npx firebase-tools@latest mcp). Manage Firestore databases, Authentication users, Cloud Functions, Hosting deployments, and Cloud Storage directly from Claude Code. Run queries, deploy functions, and configure services without switching to the Firebase console.
